Properties.Name: ChampionshipType
Properties.Description: Changes the logos based on what championship you are running

Properties.Name: RenderPage
Properties.Description: Changes the page of the render. Drover-based renders have 20 per page, team-based renders have 10. Default is 0 (top 20 drivers, top 10 teams)

Properties.Name: ConstructorsTeams
Properties.Description: Enable if there is a Constructors' Championship, disable if there is a Teams' Championship

Properties.Name: AddSponsors
Properties.Description: If true: adds the league logos. You can add these manually. If false: used the default series logos and a blank border

Properties.Name: UseTeamName
Properties.Description: In results renders: use full team names/use car names. If disabled, uses team abbreviations/no car name (only logo)

Properties.Name: StandingsLogoOnly
Properties.PublicName: Use only team logo on driver standings renders

Properties.Name: UseRealName
Properties.Description: Replaces the driver name with the driver real name

Properties.Name: UseFullCircuitName
Properties.PublicName: Use Full Circuit Names in Results
Properties.Description: Switches the short version of circuit names for the full version in race and qualifying results, and calendar renders, also decreases the font size

Properties.Name: ReservesSoloDrivers
Properties.Description: Changes the reserves render to act like they are teamless fulltime drivers

Properties.Name: CalendarFontSize
Properties.PublicName: Change font size on calendar/event info renders
Properties.Description: Changes the font size on your calendar renders so your track names can always fit correctly

Properties.Name: RaceDistance
Properties.Description: Fill in the race distance in KM. This gets converted to laps. Default is 305, a full distance F1 Grand Prix

Properties.Name: RaceLength
Properties.Description: Overrides the race distance value above. Leave empty if you want to use the race distance in KM

Properties.Name: FuelInfo
Properties.Description: Adds a recommended fuel value to the event info render. Leave at 0 to disable
